file.title: Progress bar

p.text: The main function of the object is to display the process of downloading/executing (e.g. downloading of a file from the Internet, loading of a program, etc.).

p.textAll: To deal with this object it is necessary to change the property Value in an ascending order (from 1 to 100). For convenience it's better to use the number 100 as the maximum acceptable value which logically corresponds to 100% of progress bar completeness.
